Title: Directs the public service commission to provide a class of service for facilities that use large amounts of energy; and repeals certain provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Directs the public service commission to provide a class of service for facilities that use large amounts of energy; requires an electric company that is providing electricity service to a retail electricity consumer that is a large energy use facility to enter into a contract with the retail electricity consumer that covers the provision of the electricity service; repeals certain provisions upon the expiration thereof.
LawCode: Add ยง66-x, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to directing the public service commission to provide a class of service for facilities that use large amounts of energy; and providing for the repeal of certain provisions upon expiration thereof
